definition: of or relating to studies beyond a bachelor's degree, a measuring instrument for measuring fluid volume, make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
details:
adjective
- of or relating to studies beyond a bachelor's degree
= synonyms: postgraduate
noun
- a measuring instrument for measuring fluid volume
- a person who has received a degree from a school (high school or college or university)
= synonyms: alumnus
verb
- make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
= synonyms: calibrate, fine-tune
- confer an academic degree upon
= example: confer an academic degree upon
- receive an academic degree upon completion of one's studies
= example: receive an academic degree upon completion of one's studies
